Darts A Game of Skill & Beer Darts at the IceHouse Come Join Us Co-ed League Wednesdays Shopping Get Cool Pub Swag Pub Fashion Fabulous Darling Gift Cards About The IceHouse jdoc:include type="menu" level="0" / Skip to content MAIN CONTAINER CONTENT See Inside the IceHouse Pub The IceHouse Pub The Ice House Pub is an authentic English styled pub, located in the heart of Punta Gorda. B ehind the 37 foot long mahogany bar are 26 taps dispensing the best beers from around the world like Guinness, Harp, Boddingston's, Stella Artois and Kronenbourg 1664, along with many American favorites like Yuengling, Blue Moon, Sierra Nevada and Dales. Drinking your favorite refreshment is only half the focus of the pub, British style-pub entertainment will be available to patrons. Games like snooker, bar billiards, steel tipped darts, dominoes, Shove a Penny, and Shut the Box. If you get tired of this extensive list of games a 10-foot, high definition, front projection TV and our five flat panels will provide your favorite sport for your entertainment. I f an English pub-style meal is what you crave, then the Ice House Pub should be your dining destination. With a full British themed menu of such staples as Fish 'n Chips, Cottage Pie, Bangers and Mash and the American favorites Cheese Burgers, Steak Sandwiches and Giant Salads. Built in the 1890s, the structure was used as an ice plant for the fishing industry. Over the years, it has changed owners and businesses. For a while, it had sat empty. Hurricane Charley all but destroyed the building when it tore the roof off and the south wall collapsed, but the building's owner's refused to demolish this South Florida landmark pledging to rebuild it and they did. The Ice House Pub is truly a uniquely British destination steeped in South Florida history that everyone should plan to visit. Hops and Barley Patio Come relax on our Hop and Barley Patio. //CONTENT LEFT COLUMN IceHouse Menu Home Beer, Wine & Cocktails Draft Beers Bottled Beers, Wines & Cocktails Beer Encyclopedia Food Menu Starters Entrees Lunch Features Darts Darts at the IceHouse Co-ed League Shopping Pub Fashion Gift Cards About On Tap See the Current Tap List , with Real time display of our kegs, at the IceHouse Pub!
